title: Coffee Shop Gallery
subtitle: A fully responsive coffee shop website created using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This project features a modern, clean design with smooth animations and interactive elements.

title: Full E-Commerce UI
subtitle: A fully responsive frontend for an e-commerce web application built using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion. The project covers the full shopping experience
more:
• Next.js 15 App Router architecture
  • Product filtering with smooth animations (Framer Motion)
  • Cart system (localStorage for guests, synced with API for logged-in users)
  • Wishlist management UI
  • Responsive layout with Tailwind
  • Authentication pages: login, register, profile
  • Built with modular and reusable components

title: Newportfolio
subtitle: A modern and responsive portfolio website built with Next.js 15, React, and Tailwind CSS. It highlights personal projects, services and testimonials with smooth animations.
more:
• Built with Next.js 15 App Router
  • Fully responsive layout and design
  • Dark/Light mode toggle
  • Reusable and modular components
  • Framer Motion-powered animations
  • Lucide icons integration
  • Clean structure and scalable codebase

title: GameGallery
subtitle: A modern and responsive gallery for showcasing games, built using Next.js 15, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion. It features category filtering, smooth transitions, and a clean layout.
more:
• Built with Next.js 15 App Router
  • Dynamic filtering of game cards
  • Image gallery with smooth animations
  • Dark/Light mode support
  • Modular and reusable card components
  • Fully mobile responsive design

title: ALJEBALI Portfolio Web App
subtitle: A modern, responsive, and animated portfolio built with React + Vite â€” designed to showcase your projects, skills, and contact in an elegant and interactive way.
more:
• Fully responsive design with CSS Modules
  • Project gallery with filterable cards and links
  • Dynamic project detail pages with Swiper.js and live README rendering
  • Dark/Light mode with localStorage persistence
  • Contact form with Formspree integration and Lottie animations
  • Includes scroll-to-top button and custom 404 fallback
  • Built with React 18, Vite, Swiper.js, Framer Motion, React Markdown
